Hillary Clinton Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-N.Y.), who recently took over Hillary Clinton 's former seat on the Senate Armed Services Committee, also worried today about decreased funding of the Marines: The Marine Corps must have the resources it needs to respond to new and emerging cyber threats and terror threats in different parts of the world. " Eric Schmidt , Google's current chief executive officer, will continue as the chairman of the board of directors and will serve as Google's executive chairman.
